result.reason: Synchronization for team collaboration is a valid feature request, currently partially implemented as a Beta feature (SQL/File sync) in `mRemoteNG\Config\Connections\Multiuser`, but requires further development for robustness and full team capabilities.
result.approach: Enhance the existing `RemoteConnectionsSyncronizer` and `SqlConnectionsUpdateChecker` to support robust team features, conflict resolution, and potential real-time updates beyond simple polling.
